resources.string: Press on color below to apply

Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory

%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Adjust The Dimensions of The Pulse bars in Visualizer with Custom Dimension Changer. Also Adjust The Spacing Between Them
Adjust The Size of Pulse Visualizer Blocks and Spacing Each Block
Adjust The Agression for Pulse Visualizer. Relaxed Being Smallest and Insanse Being Most Agressive
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing
Control which status bar icons are shown
Double-tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Control which status bar icons are shown

Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher.
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Customize Pie targets, sytle, size and color
Whether or not the menu button should always be shown, even when its not needed

Set the background of notifications translucent
Blur the QS tiles and background
Blur the background of recent apps window
Blur personalizations are disabled during keyguard view. Only translucent notifications are enabled.

These colors are the ones tiniting the BlurBackground. Instead of the normal Grey, you can now choose the colors in the way you like.
There are three color filters: One used for light backgrounds, one used for Dark backgrounds and one used for light/dark backgrounds.
So how these colors work?
Simple, as the titles say, the Light filter will be used for Lighter backgrounds, Dark filter for dark backgrounds and the mixed filter one will be used for backgrounds not too dark but neither too light.
These colors are used for both BlurBackgrounds: StatusBar and RecentsApps window
Blur personalizations are disabled during keyguard view. Only translucent notifications are enabled.
Allows swiping on the navigation bar to enable one handed mode
Display realtime charger current, voltage, and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
For better visibility on bright images
Long press on any image to use for static mode
Enable/Disable action for the task manager button in the expanded statusbar area
Enable/disable button in task manager to clear notifications
Enable/disable button to access running services in task manager
Disables quick settings on secure lockscreen
When Night Light is enabled automatically set the desired brightness. The default brightness is set to low brightness
